text: Into the Woods is an American 2014 musical fantasy movie. The movie takes characters from different fairy tales, mixing stories. Meryl Streep plays The Witch. Anna Kendrick plays Cinderella. Johnny Depp plays The Wolf. Christine Baranski plays The Stepmother of Cinderella. The movie was released on December 25, 2014. == Other websites == * * * * Category:2014 musical movies Category:2014 fantasy movies Category:American musical movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Movies about witchcraft Category:Movies about giants Category:Movies about wolves Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies directed by Rob Marshall
title: Into the Woods (movie)
